entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this morning. Rain showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
